configuration.jsScript:
var msg = {
    "giris-basinc": Math.random() * 100, // Input Pressure (0-100)
    "cikis-basinc": Math.random() * 100, // Output Pressure (0-100)
    "klor-olcum-degeri": Math.random() * 10, // Chlorine Measurement Value
    "faz-kaybi": Math.random() * 10, // Phase Loss
    "vana-aciklik-yuzdesi-0-100": Math.random() * 100, // Valve Opening Percentage (0-100)
    "anlik-tork-0-120": Math.random() * 120, // Instantaneous Torque (0-120)
    "vana-oransal-kontrol-komutu-0-100": Math.random() * 100, // Valve Proportional Control Command (0-100)
    "aku-besleniyor": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aku-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "dc-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "rtu-uzak-konumda": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "sebeke-yok-3-faz-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "parafudr-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-besleme-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "rtu-pano-kapisi-acik": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "cikis-basinci-arttir": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "cikis-basinci-azalt": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "acil-kapama": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "dma-odasi-kapi-acik": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "dma-odasi-su-baskin-alarm": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "fan-termostat-devrede": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "anlik-debi-m-s": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-pozisyonu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "haberlesme-hatasi": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-hareket-ediyor": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-kapali": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-acik": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-kapaniyor": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-aciliyor": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-uzak-konumda": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-yakin-bekle-konumunda": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-yakin-konumda": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "termik-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-engellendi": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-sikisti": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-elle-kontrol": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-hareket-ettirilemez": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "oransal-kontrol-aktif": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "aktuator-dahili-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "genel-alarm": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-durdur-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-kapat-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-ac-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "vana-acil-durum-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "rtu-pano-ici-nem-rh": Math.random() * 100, // RTU Panel Inside Humidity (%RH)
    "rtu-pano-ici-sicaklik-c": Math.random() * 100, // RTU Panel Inside Temperature (Â°C)
    "dijital-giris-sinyali-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "analog-giris-sinyali-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "zaman-senkronizasyon-hatasi": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "test-modu-aktif": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "modem-haberlesmesi-aktif": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "operator-panel-haberlesmesi-aktif": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "ana-kontrolcu-ariza": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "rtu-yeniden-baslatma-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true,
    "rtu-enerjisinin-kesme-komutu": Math.random() < 0.5 ? false : true
};

var msgType = "POST_TELEMETRY_REQUEST";

// Return the generated signals
return { msg: msg, msgType: msgType };

additionalInfo.description: Process incoming messages from devices with the alarm rules defined in the device profile. Dispatch all incoming messages with "Success" relation type.
